document.full_text: the united states froze its largest aid package for yemen in february after popular protests broke out against the yemeni president, the wall street journal reported on friday.
document.title: u.s. froze record yemen aid package in february: report
lines_and_colors: the united states froze its largest aid package for yemen in february after popular protests broke out against the yemeni president, the wall street journal reported on friday.
